subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kyle Quincey scored a power-play goal at 2 minutes 39 seconds of overtime as the Colorado Avalanche came back from a 3-0 deficit to beat the visiting Islanders, 4-3.
snippet: Kyle Quincey scored a power-play goal at 2 minutes 39 seconds of overtime as the Colorado Avalanche came back from a 3-0 deficit to beat the visiting Islanders, 4-3.
